name: Sapples
description:
Submitted to the Spring 2D Jam 2021, unfinished but not unloved and I will continue development ASAP.

Due to some issues along the way the plants actually stopped growing, I fully intend to fix this and finish the entire game but I will wait until the gamejam I submitted this to is fully judged to be fair first! Keep an eye on this page for updates!

Please note the game cannot currently save but that will be high on my list of priorities!

Road to completion:

  • growing plants.... again... I did it!
  • controls page to outline controls
  • clear outline of game goal
  • the ability to save your farm
  • sapples that actually appear and farm for you
  • sapples desires so they eat your precious cuberries to live!
